channel.title: [508] Npc v Player

item.title: [508] Npc v Player
item.dc:creator: @the_sever_guy the_sever_guy
item.description:
@the_sever_guy wrote:

Ok so im adding so players can attack npcs on a 508
im using palidino76 source and this is an error i get

[code]
.\palidino76\rs2\npcs\combat\npCombat.java:24: illegal start of expression
public int getAnimation(int ID) {

.\palidino76\rs2\npcs\combat\npCombat.java:24: ‘;’ Expected
public int getAnimation(int ID) {

.\palidino76\rs2\npcs\combat\npCombat.java:24: ‘;’ Expected
public int getAnimation(int ID) {

.\palidino76\rs2\npcs\combat\npCombat.java:27: cannot return a value from method
whose result type is void
return 1658;

.\palidino76\rs2\npcs\combat\npCombat.java:27: cannot return a value from method
whose result type is void
return 402;

.\palidino76\rs2\npcs\combat\npCombat.java:27: cannot return a value from method
whose result type is void
return 422;

6 errors[/code]

Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2008, 05:17:30 am[/size][hr]Sorry but nobody has posted so can i bump?

Read full topic
